Package com.advertisementproject.emailservice.service

Class EmailServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.emailservice.service.EmailServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmailService
@Service
public class EmailServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmailService
Email Service implementation that sends an email with a confirmation token link. When the user clicks this confirmation link it will go to an endpoint in the Confirmation Token Service that confirms the token included in the link.

Relevant settings for the email server are found in application.yml in the resources folder.

    • sendConfirmationLinkEmail

      public void sendConfirmationLinkEmail​(java.lang.String toEmail, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String token)
      Sends a confirmation link email with the supplied email details
      Specified by:
      sendConfirmationLinkEmail in interface EmailService
      Parameters:
      toEmail - the email address to send an email to
      name - the full name or company name of the user
      token - the token that should be included in the confirmation link

    • buildEmailConfirmationLinkEmail

      private java.lang.String buildEmailConfirmationLinkEmail​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String link)
      Helper method acting as a template that constructs a confirmation link email to send
      Parameters:
      name - the full name or company name of the user the email is sent to
      link - the confirmation link to send in the email
      Returns:
      string containing a complete email to be sent to a user
